channel.title: EvilScape | Hiring
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][i][b]Welcome to EvilScape.[/b][/i][/size]
What's coming... [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YAtVEwl_cXg#[/youtube]
[b]Scroll down for pictures[/b]!
Hello Moparscape, I've been working on this project for a few days. It's coming along very well. Sadly, I can't do everything on my own. I am looking for developers, web designers, and more players! I need your help, or anyone who's willing! Feel free to apply below.
EvilScape Guide! (Xtrememan just logged in) [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg515/scaled.php?server=515&filename=esgx.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Corporeal Beast! [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg406/scaled.php?server=406&filename=corpf.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Tormented Demons! [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg163/scaled.php?server=163&filename=torm.jpg&res=medium[/img]
King Black Dragon! [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg822/scaled.php?server=822&filename=kbdw.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Chaos Elemental! [img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/5973/chaosele.jpg[/img]
Recipe For Disaster! (Minigame) [img]http://img710.imageshack.us/img710/7414/rfdl.jpg[/img]
Skilling Area [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg36/scaled.php?server=36&filename=skillsiiq.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Yay HILLIES! <3 [img]http://desmond.imageshack.us/Himg638/scaled.php?server=638&filename=hillies.jpg&res=medium[/img]
Dungeons! [img]http://img841.imageshack.us/img841/4426/demonsn.jpg[/img]
Shops + EG Dialogue! [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/3353/npcsv.jpg[/img]
Tabs + Information [img]http://img341.imageshack.us/img341/608/rabs.jpg[/img]
Godwars! [img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/8537/16945399.jpg[/img] Hiring:
Web-designers Client Developers
Applications:
[code] Name: Age: Experience: Activeness:[/code]
If you want to play, feel free to send me a message.
- Thank you! [/center]

item.title: EvilScape | Hiring
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[ul]Name: Jonathan
Age: 15
Experience: Site Development Associate Certification

[list][li]Web site development using Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) and Extensible HTML (XHTML)[/li]
[li]Manual code writing, graphical user interface (GUI) authoring tools, and XHTML code validation[/li]
[li]Web page development using images, hyperlinks, tables, forms and frames[/li][/list]
[li]CGI and connecting Web pages to databases[/li]
[li]Internet marketing and search engine optimization (SEO)[/li]
[li]Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) for formatting Web page content, and fundamental Web design concepts[/li]
[li]Development of Web sites as managed projects[/li]
[li]Introductory e-commerce solutions, and the relationship of Web site development to business goal[/li][/ul]

Sorry about formatting list doesn’t seem to like me here.
Activeness: 1 hour in the morning and 1-2 hours at night.

Read full topic

item.description:

Kind of makes me sad that no-one is applying!

It’s because, it looks like any other server out there.

Goodluck anyway.
